PHQ-9: little interest or pleasure in doing things
trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much
feeling tired or having little energy
feeling bad about myself or that I am a failure or have let myself or my family down
trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television
moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed. Or the opposite, being so fidgety or restless that I have been moving around a lot more than usual
thoughts that I would be better off dead or of hurting myself in some way
GAD-7: feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge
not being able to stop or control worrying
worrying too much about different things
being so restless that it is hard to sit still
feeling afraid as if something awful might happen
OQ-45: feeling unhappy in my marriage/significant relationship
after heavy drinking, I need a drink the next morning to get going.
disturbing thoughts come to my mind that I cannot get rid of
feeling annoyed by people who criticize my drinking or drug use
not working/studying as well as I used to
having trouble getting along with friends and close acquaintances
having trouble at work/school because of drinking or drug use
feeling that something bad is going to happen
feeling afraid of open spaces, of driving, or being on buses, subways, and so forth
feeling my love relationships are full and complete
feeling that I am not doing well at work/school
having too many disagreements at work/school
feeling something is wrong with my mind
satisfied with my relationships with others
feeling angry enough at work/school to do something I might regret
